mapper.select: select rk.rk_id,rk.rk_time,rk.bz,rk.state, approval.app_type,ck.ck_name,staff.staff_name from rk left join approval on approval.app_id=rk.app_id left join ck on ck.ck_id=rk.ck_id left join staff on staff.staff_id=rk.staff_id

select rk.rk_id,rk.rk_time,rk.bz,rk.state, approval.app_type,ck.ck_name,staff.staff_name from rk left join approval on approval.app_id=rk.app_id left join ck on ck.ck_id=rk.ck_id left join staff on staff.staff_id=rk.staff_id where ck.ck_name=#{ckName}

select rk.rk_id,rk.rk_time,rk.bz,rk.state, approval.app_type,ck.ck_name,staff.staff_name from rk left join approval on approval.app_id=rk.app_id left join ck on ck.ck_id=rk.ck_id left join staff on staff.staff_id=rk.staff_id where rk.rk_id=#{rkId}
select product.pro_id,product.pro_name,rk_pro.number as dbNumber from rk_pro left join product on product.pro_id=rk_pro.pro_id left join rk on rk.rk_id=rk_pro.rk_id where rk.rk_id=#{rkId}
mapper.update: update rk set bz=#{bz} where rk_id=#{rkId}
mapper.select: select cat_id from category where cat_name=#{catName}

select product.pro_id,product.pro_name,product.pro_guige,product.pro_money, sum(pro_ck.pro_ck_number) as pro_ck_numbersum from product left join pro_ck on pro_ck.pro_id=product.pro_id where product.pro_name=#{proName}
